data_table.description: Retinal Pathology Notification Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Retinal Pathology Notification Form, RPN]

variable.description: Section A - Administrative. Q3. Pathology affected which eye [Retinal Pathology Notification Form, RPN]
